news.headline: Enhanced Oil Recovery Forecast Report 2025: A $68.38 Billion Market by 2033 Featuring Baker Hughes, BP, Chevron, Exxon Mobil, Halliburton, Praxair, Shell, Schlumberger, TotalEnergies, Weatherford
news.summary: The Enhanced Oil Recovery (EOR) Market is projected to grow from US$ 47.64 billion in 2024 to US$ 68.38 billion by 2033, with a CAGR of 3.04% from 2025-2033. news.summary: BASF has joined a global coalition of leading industrial and financial companies, including ExxonMobil, ADNOC, Banco Santander, and NextEra Energy, to launch Carbon Measures, a standardized carbon accounting framework aimed at improving emissions tracking and transparency across supply chains. news.headline: Wells Fargo Suggests 2 Energy Stocks to Buy in a Challenging Market
news.summary: There are headwinds in store for the oil industry, but a new report from Wells Fargo suggests that there are still plenty of sound options for investors.
